solution_line_template: Michelle kept {gives_to_one_coworker} sandwiches * {multiplier_for_self} = <<{gives_to_one_coworker}*{multiplier_for_self}={kept_for_self}>>{kept_for_self} sandwiches for herself.

This leaves {originally_made} total sandwiches – {gives_to_one_coworker} sandwiches for a coworker – {kept_for_self} sandwiches for herself = <<{originally_made}-{gives_to_one_coworker}-{kept_for_self}={sandwiches_left}>>{sandwiches_left} sandwiches for her other co-workers.
